name: UCF Finance
description: UCF Finance is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol and NFT marketplace on Solana, enabling yield optimization, staking, and community-driven financial tools. Utilizing Solana’s high throughput (65,000 TPS) and low fees ($0.01/tx), UCF provides automated portfolio management and staking with targeted 10–15% APY. Launched in October 2025, UCF trades on Tokpie (UCF/USDT, $12,866/UCF, ~$50,000+ 24h volume) and has a seeded Jupiter DEX pool ($8,900/UCF). Supported by Solana ecosystem players, including Jupiter community wallets holding ~600 UCF each, UCF ensures transparency with 55% of team tokens locked until December 2025 via Streamflow. The EgyptStyle NFT collection (up to 200,000 unique Nefertiti-inspired NFTs) grants holders benefits like fee discounts, premium news access, and exclusive bounties. Governed by community voting, UCF promotes equitable access to DeFi and NFT utilities, targeting $1M+ TVL by Q1 2026. Verify at http://www.ucffinance.xyz and explorer.solana.com/address/5JkQBPrYdRK7JsC39KPPbZi7r6uLx3ZuL7jjMf4zN4c.
